titleStmt.title: A coppy of the speech made by Sir Iohn Lenthall to the Lord-Mayor & aldermen in the Guild-Hall, London, the of 1659 for the satisfying of such as, either by mis-report or mis-understanding of some passages in it, have excepted against it.
titleStmt.author: Lenthall, John, Sir, 1625-1681.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
